library(foreign)
library(resample)
mydata<-read.dta('cholesterol.dta')
##group 1
group1<-matrix(NA,nrow=3,ncol=5)
colnames(group1)<-c("y1","y2","y3","y4","y5")
rownames(group1)<-c("mean","sd","var")
group1[1,]<-colMeans(mydata[which(mydata$group==1),3:7],na.rm = TRUE)
group1[2,]<-colStdevs(mydata[which(mydata$group==1),3:7],na.rm=TRUE)
group1[3,]<-colVars(mydata[which(mydata$group==1),3:7],na.rm=TRUE)
print(group1)
